languages.text: "Живых нет, а мертвых я не считал. Ритуал сложен в исполнении, и нам с Тавриском понадобилось много времени на его калибровку. И вот именно с тобой все получилось. А ведь какие перспективы открывались... Используя Алтарь Перемен, я бы мог менять тела вплоть до лорда {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Терры{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Люди — безмозглое стадо. Скажи им, что свобода выбирать тело — дар самого Императора, и они встанут в очередь за новыми. Назначь особую плату за миловидные лица — и станешь сказочно богат".

languages.text: "That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have worked my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"
languages.original_text: "Живых нет, а мертвых я не считал. Ритуал сложен в исполнении, и нам с Тавриском понадобилось много времени на его калибровку. И вот именно с тобой все получилось. А ведь какие перспективы открывались... Используя Алтарь Перемен, я бы мог менять тела вплоть до лорда {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Терры{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have body-swapped my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

"No survivors, and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and I a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it succeeded with. To think of all the prospects that opened... I could body-swap my way up to a Lord of Terra!"

"That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have body-swapped my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

"That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the prospects that opened... I could have body-swapped my way up to a Lord of Terra!"

To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have worked my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have worked my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

"That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have body-swapped my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

languages.text: “如果你指的是活着的，没有。至于死了的，我也没仔细数过。这个仪式执行起来非常复杂，因此我和塔夫瑞克花了很长时间才顺利校准。这个仪式只在你身上成功了。想想看，那么多无限的可能性……只要有了这座诡变祭坛，我本可以一路成为{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}泰拉{/g}的领主！”
languages.original_text: "That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have worked my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: “如果你指的是活着的，没有。至于死了的，我也没仔细数过。这个仪式执行起来非常复杂，因此我和塔夫瑞克花了很长时间才顺利校准。这个仪式只在你身上成功了。想想看，那么多无限的可能性……只要有了这座诡变祭坛，我本可以一路成为{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}泰拉{/g}的领主！”
“如果你指的是活着的，没有。至于死了的，我也没仔细数过。这个仪式执行起来非常复杂，因此我和塔夫瑞克花了很长时间才顺利校准。这个仪式只在你身上成功了。想想看，那么多无限的可能性……只要有了这座诡变祭坛，我本可以通过交换身体，一路成为{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}泰拉{/g}的领主！”

languages.text: 「あれは生き残った、いや―死人は数えなかった。儀式は複雑なため、執り行うにはタヴリスクと一緒にやっても長い時間がかかった。そして、お前は儀式の効き目があった人物だ。開かれたすべての可能性を考えるために…変化の祭壇のおかげで{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}地球{/g}の至高卿と体を交換できたら！」
languages.original_text: "That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have body-swapped my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: 「あれは生き残った、いや―死人は数えなかった。儀式は複雑なため、執り行うにはタヴリスクと一緒にやっても長い時間がかかった。そして、お前は儀式の効き目があった人物だ。開かれたすべての可能性を考えるために…地球の至高卿と体を交換できたら！」

languages.text: «Ninguna que haya sobrevivido, y tampoco he contado los muertos. Se trata de un ritual muy complejo; Tavrisk y yo tardamos mucho tiempo en calibrarlo. Y usted fue la única persona con quien funcionó. Solo de pensar en las posibilidades que entrañaba su cargo... Usando el Altar del Cambio, ¡podría haber acabado convertido en Señor de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!».
languages.original_text: "That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have worked my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: «Ninguna que haya sobrevivido, y tampoco he contado los muertos. Se trata de un ritual muy complejo; Tavrisk y yo tardamos mucho tiempo en calibrarlo. Y usted fue la única persona con quien funcionó. Solo de pensar en las posibilidades que entrañaba su cargo... Usando el Altar del Cambio, ¡podría haber acabado convertido en Señor de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!».

«Ninguna que haya sobrevivido, y tampoco he contado los muertos. Se trata de un ritual muy complejo; Tavrisk y yo tardamos mucho tiempo en calibrarlo. Y usted fue la única persona con quien funcionó. Solo de pensar en las posibilidades que entrañaba su cargo... Usando el Altar del Cambio, ¡podría haber acabado transfiriendo mi mente al cuerpo de un Señor de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!».

languages.text: "Sağ kalan yok. Ölüleri de saymadım. Ayini gerçekleştirmek karmaşık bir iş, bu yüzden Tavrisk'le benim ayarlamaları yapmamız uzun sürdü. Ayin sonunda işe yaradı. Değişim Sunağı'nı kullanarak sağladığı tüm olasılıkları düşününce... {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} Lordluğu'na kadar yükselebilirdim!"
languages.original_text: "That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have worked my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Sağ kalan yok. Ölüleri de saymadım. Ayini gerçekleştirmek karmaşık bir iş, bu yüzden Tavrisk'le benim ayarlamaları yapmamız uzun sürdü. Ayin sonunda işe yaradı. Değişim Sunağı'nı kullanarak sağladığı tüm olasılıkları düşününce... {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} Lordluğu'na kadar yükselebilirdim!"

"Sağ kalan yok. Ölüleri de saymadım. Ayini gerçekleştirmek karmaşık bir iş, bu yüzden Tavrisk'le benim ayarlamaları yapmamız uzun sürdü. Ayin sonunda işe yaradı. Değişim Sunağı'nı kullanarak sağladığı tüm olasılıkları düşününce... Beden değiştirerek {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} Lordluğu'na kadar yükselebilirdim!"

languages.text: « Ayant survécu ? Non. Et je ne compte pas les morts. Le rituel est éminemment complexe et il nous a fallu beaucoup de temps, à Tavrisk et moi-même, pour le calibrer. Et c'est sur vous qu'il a fonctionné. Pensez un peu à toutes les possibilités que cela nous ouvre... Grâce à l'Autel du Changement, j'aurais pu grimper les échelons jusqu'à devenir un Seigneur de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} ! »
languages.original_text: "That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have worked my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: « Ayant survécu ? Non. Et je ne compte pas les morts. Le rituel est éminemment complexe et il nous a fallu beaucoup de temps, à Tavrisk et moi-même, pour le calibrer. Et c'est sur vous qu'il a fonctionné. Pensez un peu à toutes les possibilités que cela nous ouvre... Grâce à l'Autel du Changement, j'aurais pu grimper les échelons jusqu'à devenir un Seigneur de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} ! »

« Ayant survécu ? Non. Et je ne compte pas les morts. Le rituel est éminemment complexe et il nous a fallu beaucoup de temps, à Tavrisk et moi-même, pour le calibrer. Et c'est sur vous qu'il a fonctionné. Pensez un peu à toutes les possibilités que cela nous ouvre... Grâce à l'Autel du Changement, j'aurais pu passer d'un corps à l'autre jusqu'à devenir un Seigneur de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} ! »

languages.text: "Überlebende nicht – und die Toten habe ich nicht gezählt. Das Ritual ist kompliziert, daher haben Tavrisk und ich lange gebraucht, um es zu kalibrieren. Und bei Euch hat es funktioniert. Wenn ich nur an die Möglichkeiten denke ... Mit dem Altar der Veränderung hätte ich sogar ein Lord von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} werden können!"
languages.original_text: "That survived, no — and I didn't count the dead. The ritual is a complex one to perform, so it took Tavrisk and me a long time to calibrate it. And you were the one it worked on. To think of all the possibilities that opened up... Using the Altar of Change, I could have worked my way up to a Lord of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Überlebende nicht – und die Toten habe ich nicht gezählt. Das Ritual ist kompliziert, daher haben Tavrisk und ich lange gebraucht, um es zu kalibrieren. Und bei Euch hat es funktioniert. Wenn ich nur an die Möglichkeiten denke ... Mit dem Altar der Veränderung hätte ich sogar ein Lord von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} werden können!"

"Überlebende nicht – und die Toten habe ich nicht gezählt. Das Ritual ist kompliziert, daher haben Tavrisk und ich lange gebraucht, um es zu kalibrieren. Und bei Euch hat es funktioniert. Wenn ich nur an die Möglichkeiten denke ... Mit dem Altar der Veränderung hätte ich durch Körpertausch bis zu einem Senator von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerraGlossary}Terra{/g} aufsteigen können!"
